name: Strawberry Jello Salad
instructions: Dissolve jello in 1 3/4 c. boiling water. As soon as it dissolves, add frozen strawberries and stir until thawed. Add pineapple and banana and mix.
Pour 1/2 of mixture into 9x13" dish or a mold. Let set in fridge, then spread sour cream on it. Top with remaining jello mixture and chill until firm.
